result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas Jon Kelsen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Statewide                EJL signed 9/7/16 - c: DA & SCSO. lmw

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Erica Ellenwood, NONA by def.  Court called.  Set for PTC.  DE does not appear. State requests a bench warrant.  Court authorizes a bench warrant.  Court adjourned.  lw
Per EFV 7/1/16 - Faxed Dispatch and Sheriff.  eif
Pre-trial conference on September 7, 2016 at 10:00 am.

CO: EFV, RPT: Gina Gross, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Karl E. Anderson,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Thomas Jon Kelsen appeared from jail. Atty Andrea would like to continue this until after August 29th. Court questions Defendant. Bond continues in form and amount.   QUASH WARRANT.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 7, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on July 1, 2016 at 02:15 pm.

CO: EFV, RPT: Gina Gross, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Karl E. Anderson,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Thomas Jon Kelsen appeared from jail.  Court notes Defendant was about 1 hour late for his Motion Hearing today.  Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2016 at 02:15 pm.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA: Megan Kelly, NONA by def. Detective Hall appears. Set for a motion hearing. ADA Kelly states he just pled guilty in a MN felony case and has a sentencing date in August. It is unknown if he is in custody in MN? State requests a warrant. Court issues a Warrant - Statewide, Wi only.
Motion hearing on July 1, 2016 at 09:00 am.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Matthew L. Hartung, Thomas Jon Kelsen pro se.  Court called at 4:10 p.m.  Attorney Hartung advises there is not an agreement.  Court questions the DE.  Set out for Motion Hearing.  Verified the DEs address.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned.  lw  Motion hearing scheduled for July 1, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference at 04-14-2016 01:00 pm

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Matthew L Hartung, Thomas Jon Kelsen pro se. Court called at 11:15 a.m.  DE now appears.  Court *QUASHES THE WARRANT*  DE's jury trial in Hennepin County has been postponed until 04/11/16.  Court will continue the PTC until after the DE's jury trial.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 11:18 a.m. lw  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
NOT COPIED OUT.  DE APPEARED LATE.
Signed by EJL on 02/11/16.  NOT COPIED OUT. lw

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Matthew L Hartung, NONA by def.  Court called at 11:07 a.m. Set for PTC.  DE does not appear.  DE lives in Colorado.  Court issues a statewide bench warrant.  Court adjourned at 11:08 a.m. lw
Pre-trial conference at 02-11-2016 11:00 am

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Thomas Jon Kelsen appeared by phone pro se.  Court called at 2:21 p.m.  DEs Hennepin County case has been postponed until 02/08/16.  Court will continue PTC.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 2:23 p.m. lw  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 11, 2016 at 11:00 am.
to appear by phone for 10/21/15 PTC. eif
Pre-trial conference at 10-21-2015 02:00 pm

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan E. Kelly, Thomas Jon Kelsen pro se.  Court called at 10:09 a.m.  State advises the court there has not been an offer by the State.  DE advises he is living in Colorado but has pending charges in Hennepin County and has a trial in two weeks.  Attorney Rebecca Murphy is representing the DE on the Hennepin County Case on 10/19/15.  Court continues the PTC.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 10:14 a.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference at 10-05-2015 09:15 am

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Kenneth N. Sortedahl, DF: Thomas Jon Kelsen appeared by phone pro se.  Court called at 2:36 p.m. State has not made an offer.  DE makes statement.  Continue PTC.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 2:38 p.m. lw  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 09:15 am.
Per EJL 7/2/15 - Faxed Dispatch and Sheriff.  eif
Pre-trial conference at 08-28-2015 02:30 pm

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Menards, Hudson, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

ADDRESS INFO for Thomas Jon Kelsen
Current: 18884 E Colorado Dr, Aurora, CO 80017 United States  (Effective: 07-02-2015)
Prior: 376 Fifth Street, Bayport, MN 55003 
per Defendant in court. sdf

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA:  Kenneth N. Sortedahl, Thomas Jon Kelsen pro se. Court quashes warrant. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 28, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Statewide               EJL signed 7/2/15 - c: DA & SCSO. eif
